content: Crypto-newsflash.com offers original coverage of the global blockchain and cryptocurrency news, provides opinions, reviews, guides, introduces to Crypto people with an aim to help the general public understand and successfully use these technologies now and in the future.We believe that the most important thing in the Blockchain revolution is the ability of people to understand and embrace the change. Our journalism standards – impartiality, truthfulness, transparency and accuracyhttps://i.postimg.cc/Gp4HQF3q/cryptonewsflash-currency-newsflash-pricing-information-bitcoin-alt-coins-more-information-cryptonews.jpgABSTRACTCrypto-newsflash is a global provider of the latest news, information, and analytics on the current state and the near future trends of major crypto markets, as well as offering innovative ways for users to trade and in- teract with DeFi (Decentralized Finance) protocols.One of the key services of the project is the Crypto-newsflash Platform, which is an integrated suite that combines data on the cryptocurrency market, educational content, social features and more in one comprehensive product.The Crypto-newsflash ecosystem includes professional analysis tools in the field of crypto trading, com- munity-focused social aspects, a payment system, advertisement service, educational tools (including the Crypto-newsflash Academy and the Unchained Education hub), and on- chain protocols.The Crypto-newsflash  mobile app serves as an extension of the tools available on the platform, as well as offering additional features such as trading alerts and gamification.In the space of DeFi, Crypto-newsflash has developed where they can make the most of Binance rapidly growing DeFi ecosystem. This, however, is only the first step, and Crypto-newsflash is also developing its own DeFi protocol on Binance smart chain. In the near future, Crypto-newsflash will release a Copy Trading platform, where users will be able to automatically copy the trades of top professional traders. Unlike other similar platforms, the Copy Trading plat- form will allow users to trade on any major exchange by connecting their API, thus leveraging the exchanges’ own security models, and it will also include a social oriented aspect with content generated by both regular users and traders.As a leading provider of financial in- formation to members of the global crypto trading market, Crypto-newsflash is creating an ecosystem that will benefit both beginners and experienced traders. Crypto-newsflash is a self-sufficient, self-financing project that receives income from its business model, namely in the form of subscription payments.The target market for Crypto-newsflash is the rapidly growing crypto sector, where the project’s educational tools make it easier for anyone to start trading, as well as giving them all the info they need in order to navigate the sometimes-perilous waters of crypto with confidence by employing proper security practices.The heart of the Crypto-newsflash platform is the CNF token  a token originally built on the Binance blockchain that underpins all transactions for the Crypto-newsflash network.The economy of the Crypto-newsflash platform has made the CNF token a multifunctional means of payment with a number of utilities within the ecosystem. The token provides access to various premium features of the platform and app, as well as providing an opportunity for users to quickly grow their own personal brand within the ecosystem.MISSIONThe mission of Crypto-newsflash is, firstly, to develop a new global analytical ecosystem that creates a simple and efficient financial environment for successful cryptocurrency trading. Secondly, the project is committed to creating a suite of on-chain tools which will enable anyone regardless of their previous crypto experience or lack thereof to make the most of everything that DeFi has to offer.While the project has these two dif- ferent directions of development, more or less divided into on-chain and off-chain aspects, both parts are united by a common mission and purpose, namely to accelerate adop- tion and give everyone the chance to participate in the rapidly growing crypto sector.FAIR LAUNCHSOFT CAP REACHED! 100 BNBTotal Supply      1,000,000,000 CNFTokens For Presale   327,000,000 CNFTokens For Liquidity   163,434,600 CNFSoft Cap              100 BNBPresale Start Time   2023.07.27 10:00 (UTC)Presale End Time   2023.07.29 12:00 (UTC)Listing On              PancakeswapLiquidity Percent   51%Liquidity Lockup Time   365 days after pool endsPINKSALE LINK:https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x602c4447BBB92694876733fE2CB9e1b19768F750?chain=BSCMAIN DATAhttps://crypto-newsflash.com/official Mail´s:contact@crypto-newsflash.comsupport@crypto-newsflash.comcontract:0xcb4e83b660e941e021c6842fc6eb63ad638600e3explorer:https://bscscan.com/token/0xcb4e83b660e941e021c6842fc6eb63ad638600e3source code:https://github.com/cryptonewsflashai/sourcecode/blob/main/code%20cnfhttps://bscscan.com/token/0xcb4e83b660e941e021c6842fc6eb63ad638600e3#codeAudit by Blocksafu:https://blocksafu.com/audit/0xCb4e83B660e941e021c6842fC6EB63AD638600e3https://github.com/cryptonewsflash/full-audit-by-blocksafu/blob/main/Crypto%20News%20Flash%20AI_certificate%20(1).pngOwnership renounced:https://bscscan.com/tx/0xf0f8498960372ef54e15f1b38bfbb0e09b33f67651c2f70f610babec3184f0c1Whitepaper:https://github.com/cryptonewsflashai/whitepaper/blob/main/whitepaper-crypto-news-flash-CNF-v1.pdfRoadmap:https://github.com/cryptonewsflash/Roadmap-V1.1.3/blob/main/roadmapTokenomics:https://github.com/cryptonewsflashai/tokenomics/blob/main/tokenomic-crypto-news-flash-ai-v1.pdfCrypto-newsflash COIN - CNFTHE ECONOMIC MODELCrypto-newsflash’s economic model is based on selling access to a set of proprietary trading tools and indicators, as well as (in the near future) the Copy Trading platform.Given that the Platform consists of tools that are designed in a modu- lar way, this allows it to quickly scale and improve the current selection of available tools and indicators with completely new features.An additional stabilizing factor is the fact that Crypto-newsflash operates in the largest and most successful sec- tor of the blockchain market, namely cryptocurrency trading, which is a huge and relatively predictable market with thousands of people entering the space every day.TOKEN OVERVIEWCNF tokens are the basis of the inter- nal economic system of Crypto-newsflash and are used to access premium services implemented on the plat- form and (in the near future) to au- tomatically copy the trades of pro- fessional traders on the Cryptonews-flash Copy Trading Platform. They serve as a special unit of account and are used to pay platform fees.CNF tokens are a universal crypto- currency that acts as a medium of circulation in the internal ecosys- tem of Crypto-newsflash and at the same time can be freely exchanged for fiat money and other cryptocurrencies.When building the Crypto-newsflash economic model, the team opted for a deflationary model, which helps re-ward early adopters.TOKENOMICShttps://i.postimg.cc/DZQynYL5/cnf-tokenomics-crypto-news-flash-bnb.pngfree photo hostingROADMAPROADMAP – CRYPTO NEWS FLASH AI – CNFCONCEPT INTRODUCTIONIn 2020, after long and extensive research into the possible ways of addressing this problem, the Crypto-newsflash founders came up with the concept of a comprehensive educational platform, offering everything from simple explanations of basic concepts in crypto and trading to expert-level tools for experienced traders.PHASE 1MAXIMUM VIABLE PRODUCT LAUNCHIn 2023 Q1 we launched the first version of the Crypto-newsflash’s platform that served as the market test on what the crypto community needs. Unlike most projects, we decided to raise money for the MVP launch via an ICO at Pinksale, opting instead to make the project driven fastly by its utility to the community.Telegram Community buildingTwitter followers buildingDeployment of Smart contract on mainnetAudit of the smart contractICO / untrecked listing coinmarketcap & coingeckoFair Launch pool creationInitial marketing pushConclusion of the Fair LaunchDEX LISTINGSWith the growth of decentralized exchanges, we added the option to purchase CNF tokens on them. Pancakeswap listingCoinmarketcap and Coingecko full listingCrypto.com trending Tokeninsight trendingCmc & coingecko trending Dextool trendingBurn EventPHASE2MOBILE APP RELEASEWe will launch our Crypto-newsflash app designed to give users the power to track their portfolio, keep up to date on the crypto market, set smart alerts and interact with the Crypto-newsflash community on the go. We are implementing features inside the app to have a mobile ecosystem consisting of everything a crypto trader needs one click away. Like all Crypto-newsflash products, the new app is powered by the CNF token.Android    Google PlaystoreIOS      AppStoreAMBASSADOR PROGRAMWe are launching the ambassador program to create an international team of Crypto-newsflash representatives who will cover the whole globe and help the project and crypto space, in general, take a leap higher. Our mission with the ambassador program is to drive global awareness, provide crypto education and expand our team around the world and thus accelerate the growth of the Crypto-newsflash company. With the ambassadors we will be able to build more global communities and expand the reach of to Crypto-newsflash.Twitter influencers and telegram callsBSC trendingsPartnershipsPHASE 3FIRST EXCHANGE LISTINGSWe created the CNF token as an internal unit of value in the Crypto-newsflash’s product ecosystem. In August of 2023, the CNF token will be listed on the first CEX. We proceeded with adding new exchanges shortly after making our CNF accessible to as many people in crypto as possible.PLATFORM STAKING LAUNCHCNF staking option was launched on the Crypto-newsflash’s platform enabling users to maximize their holdings providing token lock rewards while unlocking Crypto-newsflash’s subscription for free. The CNF staking procedure is one of the simplest ones as holders with CNF in an external wallet can simply head over to the staking section on the Crypto-newsflash’s website and select the staking duration and desired amount.TEAMCEO - Andrew F.
